pages.text: The Buddysteel fillet knife is unlike other fillet knifes. It gets sharper as you collect more buddycards. It'll always make the same amount of fish though
C'mon you might as well be making a Buddysteel hoe! At least it breaks hay faster!

pages.title: Enchantments
pages.text: Just in case you actually made one, and actually want to enchant it, you can get Buddy Binding on a Buddysteel fillet knife. You can also get enchants you can get on normal fillet knifes, but why would you enchant a fillet knife?
